title: Respond to a Positive Online Review
description: A guest has left a glowing 5-star review online, mentioning a specific employee by name for their excellent service.

tasks.description: Draft a public response thanking the guest for their review.
tasks.expected_outcome: A polite thank-you message is drafted.

tasks.description: Acknowledge their specific comments and the mention of the employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: The response is personalized to the guest's comments.

tasks.description: Post the response and ensure the mentioned employee receives recognition from their manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: The response is posted, and the employee is recognized internally.
